title: Bug 7330: Make more actions available on text selection
description: Bug 7330: Make more actions available on text selection. I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, it is not clear to users why some actions are in the context menu and some are not. We should distribute the actions in a way that is easily reachable for users from the editor without having to switch views.
OB: The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' is not available in the context menu for text selection.
EB: The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' should be available in the context menu for text selection.
SR:
1. Open the editor.
2. Select some text.
3. Right-click on the selected text to open the context menu.
4. Verify that the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is not present in the context menu.
5. Switch to the Outline view.
6. Select the same text.
7. Right-click on the selected text to open the context menu.
8. Verify that the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is now available in the context menu.
